html:
Dec 13 (Reuters) - The following are the top stories on the New York Times business pages. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.


- Veteran television journalist Chris Wallace announced on Sunday that he is leaving Fox News after about 18 years and he is set to join rival CNN's upcoming streaming service as an anchor. https://nyti.ms/3F1UPru


- Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba Group Holding BABA.N has dismissed a woman who accused a superior of sexual assault during a business trip in July. https://nyti.ms/3yhtFdS


- At Amazon site, a tornado collided with the company's peak delivery season, the company which has its highest employment during the holiday shopping season, said the tornado formed at the site's parking lot. https://nyti.ms/31Si9cX




(Compiled by Bengaluru newsroom)

(( globalnewsmonitoring@thomsonreuters.com ))
